channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "I <3 State"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "I <3 State"

item.title: Suggestion from Josep M. Bach (@txus)
item.description: Can't wait to see this one! Would you explain whether this is the first time you try something like this in production, or if there have been previous experiences (and what problems did you encounter back then)?

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: thanks, good point, i'll try to clarify what i mean by "stateful application".

item.title: Suggestion from John Pagonis (@)
item.description:
This sounds interesting:-)

By a "stateful application" do you imply something Smalltalk-like where the app and its state is preserved in the same image at all times? Can you please elaborate a bit so that people understand what is this about (and thus are well informed when they vote for your proposal:-)?
